```{r slice_ methods}
flights |> 
    group_by(month) |> 
    slice_max(dep_delay) |> 
    relocate(dep_delay) |> 
    arrange(desc(dep_delay))
```

```{r}
flights |> 
    group_by(year, month, day) |>
    summarise(n = n()) |> 
    summarise(mean = mean(month))

flights |> 
    group_by(year, month, day) |>
    summarise(n = n(),
              .groups = "drop") |> 
    summarise(mean = mean(month))
```
